original_text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
korean_text: 어떤 사람들이 화를 내어 서로 말하되 어찌하여 이 향유를 허비하는가

sentences.original_text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 이들은 속으로 분노를 품고 있었다

sentences.original_text: Why was this waste of the ointment made?
